fields.name: BmcConnectionString
fields.description: The connection string for the baseboard management controller including IP address and protocol.

fields.name: BmcCredentials
fields.description: The credentials of the baseboard management controller on this bare metal machine.

fields.name: BmcMacAddress
fields.description: The MAC address of the BMC for this machine.

fields.name: BootMacAddress
fields.description: The MAC address associated with the PXE NIC card.

fields.name: MachineDetails
fields.description: The free-form additional information about the machine, e.g. an asset tag.

fields.name: MachineName
fields.description:
The user-provided name for the bare metal machine created from this specification.
If not provided, the machine name will be generated programmatically.

fields.name: RackSlot
fields.description: The slot the physical machine is in the rack based on the BOM configuration.

fields.name: SerialNumber
fields.description: The serial number of the machine. Hardware suppliers may use an alternate value. For example, service tag.
